scripts.build: echo 'Cloudflare Worker does not require build step'
scripts.d1:create: npx wrangler d1 execute --local --file src/db/create.sql feedbackflow-db
scripts.d1:migrate:v2-v3: npx wrangler d1 execute --local --file src/db/migrations/v3_add_links_table.sql feedbackflow-db
scripts.d1:migrate:all: npm run d1:migrate:v0-v1 && npm run d1:migrate:v1-v2 && npm run d1:migrate:v2-v3
scripts.d1:migrate:v2-v3:remote: npx wrangler d1 execute --remote --file src/db/migrations/v3_add_links_table.sql feedbackflow-db
scripts.d1:migrate:all:remote: npm run d1:migrate:v0-v1:remote && npm run d1:migrate:v1-v2:remote && npm run d1:migrate:v2-v3:remote
scripts.d1:create:remote: npx wrangler d1 execute --remote --file src/db/create.sql feedbackflow-db
scripts.d1:init: npx wrangler d1 execute --local --file src/test/seed-test-data.sql feedbackflow-db
